â¸ºBest italian food for your family

Amazing and hygiene pasta and pizza parlor.

All about quality you can trust. As one of the original founding pizza brands and the 3rd largest pizza chain, our sole mission is making the freshest, tastiest. Professional chef 1 800 222 000 5 star reviews from our satisfied customers. Get free delivery your food of happiness in within 30 minutes. Heart of kitchen

Our Specialities

Workers Menu Experience Chefs

Satisfied customers

Food lovers Mamma garcia 5.0 Excellent, delicious and tasty pizza, staff is highly attentive, excellent place to have pizza they also have home delivery. William smith 5.0 Tasty pizza, staff is very attentive, excellent place to have pizza they also have home delivery and take away services. Larry wightman 5.0 Talking about this branch the staff, quality of food & most importantly the speed of service is just great! recommended. Mamma garcia 5.0 We got that and a slice of pizza and split it down the middle. It was amazing and soo much food we had left overs. Our last 16 years journey

We are aparte a young and beautiful team with a passion for tasty and traditional food Rediscovering and relieving traditional romanian delicacies.

item.title: Our menu

item.content:encoded:
â¸ºBuy one pizza. Get one free.

Double fun on every delivery.

All about quality you can trust. As one of the original founding pizza brands and the 3rd largest pizza chain, our sole mission is making the freshest, tastiest and funnest pizza around.

Exclusive menu Order by call - 1 800 222 000 Delicious meals

item.title: Our chefs
item.dc:creator: lstcraftoadm
item.content:encoded:
â¸ºMasterchef's message

Herman Miler

Unique and delicious dishes from the worlds best masterchefs. Lorem ipsum dolor amet consectetur pellentesque blandit ultrices purus suspendisse iaculis ultricies sagittis. Proin vulputate eleifend cras lacinia iaculis feugiat egestas neque sodales. Meet our chef

item.title: Contact us
item.dc:creator: lstcraftoadm
item.content:encoded:
We'd Love to hear from you.

Feel free to get in touch?

401 Broadway, 24th Floor,
Orchard View, London

Get directions Let's talk with us? Phone: 1-800-222-000 Fax: 1-800-222-002 How can we help you? info@yourdomain.com help@yourdomain.com

Say hello!hallÃ¥!salve!

    Looking for a franchise that focuses on quality food? join the network
    • Facebook-f
    • Dribbble
    • X-twitter
    • Instagram
    • Linkedin-in

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: lstcraftoadm
item.content:encoded:
[rev_slider alias="pizza-parlor" slidertitle="Pizza-Parlor"][/rev_slider]

The true taste of italy

25 Pizza 20 Burgers 35 Salad 08 Fries 10 Drinks 20 Chicken â¸ºBest italian food for your family

The amazing pasta and pizza parlor.

All about quality you can trust. As one of the original founding pizza brands and the 3rd largest pizza chain, our sole mission is making the freshest, tastiest.

About restaurant 1 800 222 000 Fast delivery

Within 30 minutes

Pickup delivery

Grab your food order

Absolute dining

Best buffet restaurant

Our signature

Popular pizza

5.0 Mexican green wave $25.00 $19.00 4.9 Indi tandoori paneer $24.00 $18.00 5.0 Double chicken sausage $22.00 $20.00 4.3 Grilled veal cooked $20.00 $16.00 signature Delicious meals

Exclusive menu

New Spring fling pizza Must try Lorem ipsum has been the industry. $10.00 Farm villa pizza Lorem ipsum has been the industry. $18.00 Hot Paneer tikka pizza Lorem ipsum has been the industry. $20.00 Korma special pizza Lorem ipsum has been the industry. $12.00 Hot Hot passion pizza Chef love Lorem ipsum has been the industry. $16.00 Mexican combo pizza Lorem ipsum has been the industry. $20.00 Explore menu Food lovers

Satisfied customers

Excellent, delicious and tasty pizza, staff is highly attentive, excellent place to have pizza they also have home delivery and take away services. Alexander moore Talking about this branch the staff, quality of food, most importantly the speed of service is just great! Highly recommended restaurant. Must try take away services. Matthew taylor We got that and a slice of pizza and split it down the middle. It was amazing and soo much food we had left overs. The food there is simply delicious. Herman miller Previous Next Satisfied Why choose us?

We are known

Always serve fresh food Perfectly portioned ingredients. We have popular masterchef The patient staff reflects the style. Delicious pizza recipes Best crust with this good recipe. Maintaining the quality of food Standardized food recipes for menu. Best live music restaurants Beautiful natural & serene ambience. Wonderful dining experience A memorable dining atmosphere.
